• {{menu}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.scss'] }) export class MenuComponent { lista = ["FrontEnd", "BackEnd", "BD", "Frameworks", "Librerias", "Arquitecturas", "Transversales","Servidores"]; dias = ["Lunes", "Martes", "Miercoles", "Jueves", "Viernes", "Sabado", "Domingo"]; constructor() { } }
